means: Visit to Innovative Schools for Interested Teachers 为感兴趣的教师安排参观访问富于创新的学校

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词或词组均含有"拜访，访问"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: call on, see, visit, drop in
means: call on ： 社交上的正式用语，指无目的、礼节性的短暂拜访，访问者与被访问者之间一般只有社交或公务关系。
see ： 常用词，含义广泛，既可指接受他人来访，又可指去访问他人。
visit ： 正式用词，强调出于工作需要的访问，也指亲戚朋友间的看望。
drop in ： 多指在计划之外或事先未打招呼的偶然、顺便访问。也可指参观。

provision预备+al……的→预备的,临时的

vis看,查+ual……的→adj.看的,看得见的;视觉的

sentence.cn: 几乎不可能处理的事情是，在事故发生的前一天，凯丽去拜访了她的朋友。
sentence.en: The day before the accident, Kerry had visited her friend, and had spent the whole time criticizing her choice of boyfriends, the way she was living, the way she related to her mother, and various other things she felt she needed to express.

means.word_mean: 参观;拜访;探望
其他释义

entry.def: If you visit someone, you go to see them and spend time with them.

example.ex: He wanted to visit his brother in Worcester...
example.tran: 他想去看望住在伍斯特的哥哥。

example.ex: He was visited by an old friend from Iraq...
example.tran: 一位来自伊拉克的老朋友来看望他。

entry.def: If you visit a place, you go there for a short time.

example.ex: He'll be visiting four cities including Cagliari in Sardinia...
example.tran: 他将要访问4个城市，包括萨迪尼亚的卡利亚里。

example.ex: Caroline visited all the big stores.
example.tran: 卡罗琳光顾了所有的大型商店。

entry.def: If you visit a website, you look at it.

example.ex: For details visit our website at www.cobuild.collins.co.uk.
example.tran: 欲知详情，请访问我们的网站www.cobuild.collins.co.uk。

entry.def: If you visit a professional person such as a doctor or lawyer, you go and see them in order to get professional advice. If they visit you, they come to see you in order to give you professional advice.
entry.tran: 上门咨询（专业人士）;（专业人士）上门服务

example.ex: If necessary the patient can then visit his doctor for further advice...
example.tran: 如有必要，病人可以上门咨询自己的医生以得到更多的建议。

example.ex: A doctor will visit you in your apartment.
example.tran: 会有医生到您的住所出诊。

entry.def: If something very unpleasant is visited upon you, it happens to you.

example.ex: Violence is visited upon us every day...
example.tran: 暴力事件每天都会降临在我们身上。

example.ex: Death and suffering had been visited on thousands of innocents.
example.tran: 死亡和苦难降临在了数千名无辜的人身上。

means.word_mean: 1. the act of going to see some person or place or thing for a short time;
2. a meeting arranged by the visitor to see someone (such as a doctor or lawyer) for treatment or advice;

sentences.sentence: "he scheduled a visit to the dentist"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of visiting in an official capacity (as for an inspection)
4. the act of going to see some person in a professional capacity;
5. a temporary stay (e.g., as a guest)
1. visit a place, as for entertainment;

sentences.sentence: "We went to see the Eiffel Tower in the morning"

means.word_mean: 2. go to certain places as for sightseeing;
3. pay a brief visit;

sentences.sentence: "The mayor likes to call on some of the prominent citizens"

means.word_mean: 4. come to see in an official or professional capacity;
5. impose something unpleasant;

sentences.sentence: "The principal visited his rage on the students"

means.word_mean: 6. talk socially without exchanging too much information;

sentences.sentence: "the men were sitting in the cafe and shooting the breeze"

means.word_mean: 7. stay with as a guest;

sentences.sentence: "Every summer, we visited our relatives in the country for a month"

means.word_mean: 8. assail;

sentences.sentence: "He was visited with a terrible illness that killed him quickly"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French visiter or Latin visitare 'go to see', frequentative of visare 'to view', from videre 'to see'

sentences.cn: 我到他在旧金山的家中作客。
sentences.en: I visited with him in San Francisco.

sentences.cn: 我们在伦敦逗留时常去看戏.
sentences.en: During our visit to London we often went to the theatre.

sentences.cn: 在伦敦逗留期间,我们去伦敦塔参观了两次.
sentences.en: When we were in London we visited the Tower twice.

sentences.cn: 他在伦敦的短期逗留从各方面看来是有益的.
sentences.en: His brief visit to London was from many points of view helpful.

sentences.cn: 约翰在他祖父的农场逗留时,对自然界有了认识.
sentences.en: John's eyes were opened to the world of nature when he visited his grandfather's farm.

sentences.cn: 许多候鸟每年到这个湖上作短期逗留.
sentences.en: Many migratory birds visit this lake annually.

sentences.cn: 我们在伦敦逗留期间访问了白金汉宫.
sentences.en: During our stay in London, we visited Buckingham Palace.

sentences.cn: 莉莉, 我们可以开微型车在州内逗留不同的地方.
sentences.en: George : Well , Lili, we can visit different places in the state in our van.

sentences.cn: 她们准备在一位老姑母家逗留一段时期,希望在那儿能解决达吉雅娜的订婚问题.

sentences.cn: 我们看望索菲姨妈逗留的时间太长了.

sentences.cn: 在此逗留期间,你们真应该去参观一下科学博物馆.
sentences.en: You should really visit the science museum while you are here.

sentences.cn: 他在台北逗留.

sentences.en: He visited a lot of place during his stay in the country.

sentences.cn: 在欧洲逗留期间,我们应该去荷兰游览.
sentences.en: While we're in Europe we ought to visit Holland.

sentences.cn: 我却有机会在瑞士逗留期间参观两间规模小的工厂.
sentences.en: However I had the opportunity to visit two small factories during my stay in Switzerland.

sentences.cn: 他在英国的长期逗留是最难得的事.
sentences.en: His prolonged visit to England had been most valuable.

sentences.cn: 我每次逗留时间从3个星期到两个月不等。
sentences.en: My visits lasted anywhere from three weeks to two months.

sentences.cn: 这是社交性的拜访，还是业务性的？
sentences.en: Is this a social visit , or is it business?

sentences.cn: 不管是哪种情况，研究生新生都可以拜访系办公室或给他们发邮件询问相关信息，借此了解自己的导师或临时导师是谁。
sentences.en: In  any  case,  new  graduate  students  can  learn  who  their  advisers  or  temporary  advisers  are  by  visiting  or  emailing  the  departmental  office and asking for the information.

sentences.cn: 这一带的猎鸟者称这些鹦鹉有时会“拜访”养鸟人.

sentences.cn: 她拜访穷亲戚时穿得比较俭朴, 以免因摆阔而伤害他们的感情.
sentences.en: She dressed down to visit her poor relatives, so as not to offend them by a show of her wealth.

sentences.cn: 我的美国朋友下个假期将来拜访我.
sentences.en: My American friend are visiting me next vacation.

sentences.cn: 我期待尽快可以再次拜访你.
sentences.en: I look forward to coming back to visit you as soon as possible.
